events.message: I recently purchased a product but would like to request a refund because it did not meet my expectations at all.
The issue has been classified under the refund category as the customer requests returning the product.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and will respond shortly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you would like to return the product?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product did not work as advertised and I am very disappointed.
We apologize for the inconvenience. We can process a full refund for you once we receive the returned item.
Thank you for your quick response. I appreciate the refund offer and will send the product back soon.
The refund request has been approved, and instructions for returning the product have been sent to your email.
We are checking in to confirm you received the refund after returning the item. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since your refund has been processed successfully and there are no further concerns, this case is now closed.
We have sent you a customer satisfaction survey to rate your experience with our refund service.
